name: Loki
temple_description:
The deity of mischief and trickery in Norse mythology, 
as well as the god of fire. Originally a giant, 
Loki joined the Aesir due to a friendship with Odin. 
However, their cunning nature often led them to play 
tricks on other deities, earning both admiration 
and exclusion. Loki played a key role in triggering 
the twilight of the gods.

active_skills.name: Phantom Spell (The Art of Invisibility)
active_skills.effect:
Deals 500% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK 
and inflicts [Blind] for 2 rounds, reducing their ACC 
by 50% of Loki's ACC. 
Loki gains [Invisibility] (non-dispellable) for 2 rounds. 
If Loki is in [Invisibility] and at least one ally is alive, 
they are immune to single-target attacks.

active_skills.name: Live or Die (Judgment of Fate)
active_skills.effect:
Loki rolls the Divine Dice of Destiny to determine 
the fate of all enemies. Deals (dice result * 75%) P.DMG 
to all enemies and dispels all buffs from 1 random enemy.

fate.fate_name: A Song of Ice and Fire
